Summary: 3 Orange Lights spotted above Lincoln Park, MI
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Lincoln Park
There were no other sightings in Lincoln Park on or around July 24th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWe we coming home from Meijer and putting groceries inside of the house, when we spotted 3 different orange lights. The first two were 2 minutes apart, and the third was 5 minutes from the last one. They all came from the same area and then went southwest, but in different and a spread out way. We've seen this lights many times before, starting last year around the 4th of July. WHAT ARE THEY!?!?!?
